title: Start
body:
<<BGM GlobalStats Neutral>>
<<setTutorial Tutorial 3>>
<<layerSet Dialogue 3>>
<<BG BG Backstage>>
<<outfit Aig Stage>>
<<outfit J-Pe Stage>>
<<outfit Lee Stage>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<move J-Pe StageRight1>>
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
<<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RSWF>>
All right, boys. Showtime!
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Just so we're clear, everybody knows what they're doing, right?
We all know how this performance is going to work?
->No, teach me!
    <<expression Aig NONB>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Uh...can we go over it one more time?
    <<expression Kent RHWU>>
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    Jesus Christ.
    <<expression Kent AHNF>>
    Alright, ONE more time.
    <<start Tutorial>>
    This debut concert is just the first of many performances you'll have during your career.
    Well, HOPEFULLY the first of many.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    Nothing should suprise you out there. What you do during a performance is just like what you do during training.
    The big difference is that you're not out there to gain experience, you're out there to get FANS.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    Fans, my sweet Aigburth, is what it's all about.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    Get enough new fans at this concert, and you'll be signed onto the label.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    Fail to impress, and the three of you are out on your asses.
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    *gulp*
    H-how do I get fans?
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    Just do well during the performance.  Hit your marks just like you do during training.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    How many fans you get during each portion of the concert is going to depend on how well you did during your training.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    Basically, if you're good at something, you'll get more fans when doing it at the performance.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    The chemistry you have with J-Pe and Lee can also net you some fans.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    If you have good rapport with your bandmates, people will respond.
    <<next Tutorial>>
    On the other hand, they'll respond poorly if they sense any awkwardness between you guys.
    So I hope ya'll've been making nice these few weeks.
    <<end Tutorial>>
    You got all that?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    I-I think so?
-> I've got it.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    I-I think so?
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
    Yeh Kimmy, we got it.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
Faaaaantastic.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
Okay boys, how're we feeling? Good?
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Swaggadocio.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
...
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
Not sure what I was expecting.
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Aig, how about you?
->I'm ready!
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I’m...I'm ready.
    <<expression Aig RLWF>>
    Let's do this!
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent NHNF>>
    That's not what your flop sweat is saying, but I admire the attitude.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    Oh god...
    <<expression J-Pe RSNF>>
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    Would you guys relaaaaaax already, there's nothing to worry about.
    <<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
    We were ready the second we left the academy. 
    And on top of that, we've been training our asses off for a month.
    <<flip J-Pe>> 
    <<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
    Look worse case scenario, I carry the band on my back.
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe NHNF>>
    Easy money.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NHNF>>
    Y-yeah, J-Pe's right.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe RLNF>>
    Don't you know it.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig RLNF>>
    We're ready for this, we've been preparing all month!
    What could possibly go wrong?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Besides, the paths of our existence have already been mapped out for us a long time ago, and without our consent.
    <<expression Kent NNNF>>
    <<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    <<expression Lee ROSF>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<flip Lee>>
    Fate, destiny...the government. Call it what you will.
    We're all just sick little Punches and Judys, fated to beat the living shit out of each other on whatever the cosmic equivalent of Ellis Island is. 
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    Free will is hologram, you guys.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent RHWU>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe ROSB>>
    Right.  So there's that too.
->A little nervous, honestly.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent RHSF>>
    Aig?
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig AOSF>>
    *BLARG*
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent AHWU>>
    God damn it.
    <<flip Kent>>
    <<expression Kent AHNF>>
    Can we get a mop over here?
    <<expression Kent AHNU>>
    And, like, a hundred wet naps.
    <<flip Kent>>
    <<expression Kent NNNF>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    UGH! Seriously, dude?!
    <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
    You got flecks of - I don't even know what this is - all over my blazer!
    What the hell did you eat?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    Are you kidding? I haven't eaten in days! I'm too nervous!
    That's probably bits of my pancreas or something.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expresion J-Pe ANNF>>
    Jesus, man!
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NLNB>>
    Ha.
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression AOWF>>
    What's so funny, Lee!?
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    ...
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
Alright, everybody shut up.

title: Dance
body:
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Listen, there's a few last minute changes before you go out there.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
What kind of last minute changes?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Aig.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RNWF>>
Y-yeah?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
You're taking center stage during the big dance break. 
Front and center, got it?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RSWF>>
Uh...y-yeah! Sure.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Lee, you take Aig's old spot.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Sure.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Alright boys, make mama proud.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AHNF>>
Oh baby! Let's do it gents!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<move Lee OffStageRight>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Miss Kent?
<<flip Kent>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Aig, you've got to get out there.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONB>>
I know, it's just...
<<expression Aig NONF>>
...why did you give me the dance break?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Because you're our strongest dancer.  You've proven that over the last few weeks.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RSNF>>
R-Really?!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Yeah, sure.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
Thanks, Miss Kent!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression NSNF>>
No need to thank me, I'm just trying to put our best foot forward on this.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression ANNF>>
Now seriously, get out there.
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Yes ma'am!
<<flip Aig>>
<<move Aig OffStageRight>>

title: Publicity
body:
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Listen, there's a few last minute changes before you go out there.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
What kind of last minute changes?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
We were going put J-Pe out there as the frontman.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
Yeah. Tell me something I don't know, gorgeous.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent AHNF>>
I was just about to.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Believe it or not, the public response to Aig has been climbing steadily. Nearly to the same level as J-Pe.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
R-Really?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
WHAT?!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
So instead of having J-Pe take center, we're going to have you guys split it.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANNF>>
Split center?! I don't SPLIT center!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Well, you do now. We're going for a "friendly rivals" kind of thing, so work with that.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RONF>>
"Friendly rivals?" What does that mean?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
Yeah, what does THAT mean?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Just play up the tension between you two.  You know, cheeky banter, playful jabs, the works.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
We're going for a "will they, won't they" kind of vibe.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RNNF>>
Will they or won't they...
<<expression Aig ROWB>>
do... what? Exactly?
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
<<expression Aig RNWF>>
Oh, I WILL, Aiggy! I WILL all over your god damn face!
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
That's the spirit.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
Uh...
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
What about me? What should I do?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Lee, uh...
<<name Friendship Lee>>
...
...
...
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Yeeeaaaahh. Keep doing that.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Swag.
<<flip Kent>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee OffStageRight>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONB>>
Uh...
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
o-okay.
<<move Aig OffStageRight>>

title: Vocals
body:
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Listen, there's a few last minute changes before you go out there.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
What kind of last minute changes?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
We had a listen to the pre-recording you guys did for the backing track, and we want to make a few changes.
Lee, we're moving you off the chorus and onto the verses.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee ANNB>>
...
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Aig.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
Y-yeah.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
You'll be taking the lead vocals during the chorus.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
R-really?!
<<expression Aig NLWF>>
Thanks, Miss Kent!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
No need to thank me, just trying to put our best foot forward.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Wait, what about me?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
J-Pe, you take all the “yeah”s and the “baby”s.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
What?! That's so lame!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
J-Pe, the song is like...seventy five percent "yeah"s and "baby"s.
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Technically, you have the biggest part.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
Oh...
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
Aight, then.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Alright, don't forget the new distribution -- I don’t want you guys stepping on each other's lines.
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Now get out there, boys. Make mama proud.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AHNF>>
Alright, gents. Let's do it!
<<flip Lee>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<move Lee OffStageRight>>
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
Miss Kent?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
What is it, Aig? You need to go.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
Just...thanks for the bigger vocal part.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNWU>>
Like I said, no need to thank me. 
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
You've shown big improvements in your vocals lately, it was a no brainer.
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
Just remember, if anything fucks up during the chorus tonight, it'll DEFINITELY be your fault.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent RSWB>>
Break a leg.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
*gulp*
<<flip Aig>>
<<move Aig OffStageRight>>

title: AllRounder
body:
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Listen, you boys have done good work these past few weeks.
The only way you can fail out there is if you trip yourselves up.
Just remember your training, trust each other, trust yourselves, and you'll be fine.
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Got it?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
Wow. How inspiring.
Thanks, coach.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
I don't appreciate your sarcasm.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RLNF>>
Aw, sure you do, Kimmy.  You know you love me!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
Alright boys, let's make some magic!
<<flip Kent>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee OffStageRight>>
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NOWF>>
Miss Kent?
<<flip Kent>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
Aig, you'll be fine, alright?
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
Just get out there.
<<flip Kent>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
Thanks!
<<flip Aig>>
<<move Aig OffStageRight>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent RSNF>>
...

title: LowStats
body:
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
*sigh*
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
Listen, we've got a snowball's chance in hell with this.  IF we're lucky.
<<expression Kent RHWB>>
So just... I don't know...
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
Try not to embarrass yourselves.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANNF>>
Wow, thanks for the vote of confidence, Kimmy.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
What do you want me to say, J-Pe? "I believe in you?"
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
I mean, something to that effect.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Well, I don't. I'm not a liar, guys.
<<expression NNNF>>
Now get out there, and do your best.
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<expression Kent RHWU>>
Whatever that looks like.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
...
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NOSF>>
*cough*
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Is she doing that, like, "negative reinforcement" thing?
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe RNNF>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Lee RNNF>>
Where she tells us we're bad to inspire us, or something?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NONB>>
Somehow...I don't think so.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
Whatever. Screw her!
<<flip J-Pe>>
We don't need her!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
C'mon, boys, let's boogie!
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<move Lee OffStageRight>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
...
<<expression Aig NONB>>
...oh man.
<<move Aig OffStageRight>>

title: PreConcert
body:
<<fadeOut Cover>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
...
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<fadeIn Cover>>
<<move Aig StageLeft1>>
<<move Lee StageRight2>>
<<move J-Pe StageRight1>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Alright, this is it! Fans, fame, fortune...
<<expression J-Pe NOSB>>
Uhh...
<<expression J-Pe RHSF>>
Other good words that start with 'f'?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Fabiform.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
Sure, fabiform.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
You ready, Aig?
->Yeah!
    <<expression Aig RLWF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah! Let’s do this!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe RLWF>>
    <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
    That's what I like to hear!
    <<expression J-Pe ALWF>>
    Aight, let's hustle!
->Scream into the void.
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    Aiggy, what the hell?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee ASSF>>
    Yes, Aigburth! Scream! Scream into the void so that it might scream back!
    <<expression Lee AOWF>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    <<expression Lee AOWF>>
    AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
     <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    <<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
    Would you two knock it off! You do realize our mics are on, right?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Oh, uh...
    ...
    <<expression Aig NONB>>
    Oopsy?
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
    God damn it.
    <<expression J-Pe ANNF>>
    Let's just go.
<<name Friendship ...>>
The three of you quickly huddle together in a group hug before setting off to go on stage.
<<move Aig OffStageLeft>>
<<move Lee OffStageRight>>
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<fadeOut Cover>>
